attributes.action: Petition for a vote of no confidence in the current goverment.
attributes.additional_details:
An instruction, from the public to their servants, that parliament move for a vote of no confidence in David Cameron and the coalition government, and therefore have an immediate general election.
This is because (among other things) this government, by cutting benefits to the poor, education and NHS funding, families, and generally those in need, is systematically destroying the welfare state that makes this country Great, and is, by doing so, harming the economy, by not ensuring an educated and healthy workforce.
Alternatively, the government may hold a referendum to the same effect.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
